welcome_message_body: Welcome to Abu Dhabi, where modernity meets tradition in a city renowned for its stunning architecture, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bateen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Bateen Airport offers exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Abu Dhabi International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal for Etihad Airways and other select airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
